trans-unit.source: Indicates that the modified reference type is a boxed value type.
trans-unit.target: 指示修饰的引用类型是装箱的值类型。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft C++ compiler supports boxed value types directly in the language.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft c + + 编译器支持直接在语言中的装箱的值类型。

trans-unit.source: Information about boxed value types is emitted into metadata as a custom modifier, where the modifier decorates a reference to the value type being boxed.
trans-unit.target: 用作自定义修饰符，其中该修饰符修饰对正在装箱值类型的引用情况下，有关装箱的值类型的信息发送到元数据。

trans-unit.source: Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 编译器发出元数据，以更改默认行为不恰当时，会在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值的方式中的自定义修饰符。

trans-unit.source: When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies.
trans-unit.target: 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它将处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。

trans-unit.source: Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values.
trans-unit.target: 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。

trans-unit.source: The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers.
trans-unit.target: JIT 编译器必须响应所需修饰符，但可以忽略可选修饰符。

trans-unit.source: You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques:
trans-unit.target: 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：

trans-unit.source: Using methods in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class such as <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineField%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineProperty%2A>.

Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，再将包含的文件内容组合[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。
使用非托管的反射 API。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to emit an <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsBoxed> object into an assembly using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何发出<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsBoxed>为使用反射程序集的对象。
